title: Child Education
shorttext: Education transforms lives and breaks the cycle of poverty that traps so many children. The groundwork for a better life lies in education. It is the most powerful catalyst for social transformation. However, a child cannot be educated in isolation. Only an empowered family, especially the mother, would be willing to educate their child. Thus, rather than focusing on only one stage of a person's life, we believe in the lifecycle approach.

title: Women's Empowerment
shorttext: Various studies, as well as our experience, have shown that when we work towards women empowerment, the whole society benefits. But unfortunately in India, far from empowering women, most are denied even their basic rights like health, education of girls for women empowerment, employment and a respectable status in society. These people are in particular need of support. Please consider donating or fundraising to help more in similar situations
